Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable * Drop upstreamed patches * Update Turkish locale - Add support for AdBlock - Support several common modifiers in the location bar for modifying the typed in url - Add Password Management / AutoFill - Save and restore the tab back/forward history (Qt 4.6) - Limit download progress updates to 5 per second to reduces CPU use from 18% to 3% - Allow urls to be dropped on the bookmark bar and bookmark menu - Lots of improvements and bug fixes
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable * Add a patch to hide hidden files in directory listing, fix character encoding in directory listing - Add support for search keywords in the location bar - POST support for OpenSearch suggestion requests - Remember last used save directory - Significantly speed up the cookie dialog by keeping a cached copy of all the cookies - Lots of improvements and bug fixes
